name: gQuestionMarksItemName
description: sQuestionMarksDesc

name: Poké Ball
description: A tool used for catching wild Pokémon.

name: Great Ball
description: A good Ball with a higher catch rate than a Poké Ball.

name: Ultra Ball
description: A better Ball with a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

name: Master Ball
description: The best Ball that catches a Pokémon without fail.

name: Premier Ball
description: A rare Ball made in commemoration of some event.

name: Heal Ball
description: A remedial Ball that restores caught Pokémon.

name: Net Ball
description: A Ball that works well on Water- and Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Nest Ball
description: A Ball that works better on weaker Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
description: A Ball that works better on Pokémon on the ocean floor.

name: Dusk Ball
description: Works well if used in a dark place.

name: Timer Ball
description: A Ball that gains power in battles taking many turns.

name: Quick Ball
description: Works well if used on the first turn.

name: Repeat Ball
description: A Ball that works better on Pokémon caught before.

name: Luxury Ball
description: A cozy Ball that makes Pokémon more friendly.

name: Level Ball
description: A Ball that works well on lower level Pokémon.

name: Lure Ball
description: A Ball that works well on fished up Pokémon.

name: Moon Ball
description: A Ball that works well on Moon Stone users.

name: Friend Ball
description: A Ball that makes a Pokémon friendly when caught.

name: Love Ball
description: Works well on Pokémon of the opposite gender.

name: Fast Ball
description: Works well on very fast Pokémon.

name: Heavy Ball
description: Works well on very heavy Pokémon.

name: Dream Ball
description: A Ball that works well on sleeping Pokémon.

name: Safari Ball
description: A special Ball that is used only in the Safari Zone.

name: Sport Ball
description: A special Ball used in the Bug- Catching Contest.

name: Park Ball
description: A special Ball for the Pal Park.

name: Light Ball
description: Works well on very light Pokémon.

name: Cherish Ball
description: A rare Ball made in commemoration of some event.

name: Potion
description: Restores the HP of a Pokémon by 20 points.

name: Super Potion
description: Restores the HP of a Pokémon by 60 points.

name: Hyper Potion
description: Restores the HP of a Pokémon by 120 points.

name: Max Potion
description: Fully restores the HP of a Pokémon.

name: Full Restore
description: Fully restores the HP and status of a Pokémon.

name: Revive
description: Revives a fainted Pokémon with half its HP.

name: Max Revive
description: sMaxReviveDesc

name: Fresh Water
description: A mineral water that restores HP by 30 points.

name: Soda Pop
description: A fizzy soda drink that restores HP by 50 points.

name: Lemonade
description: A very sweet drink that restores HP by 70 points.

name: Moomoo Milk
description: A nutritious milk that restores HP by 100 points.

name: Energy Powder
description: A bitter powder that restores HP by 60 points.

name: Energy Root
description: A bitter root that restores HP by 120 points.

name: Heal Powder
description: A bitter powder that heals all status problems.

name: Revival Herb
description: A bitter herb. Revives a Pokémon outside of battle.

name: Antidote
description: Out of battle, heals a poisoned Pokémon.

name: Paralyze Heal
description: Out of battle, heals a paralyzed Pokémon.

name: Burn Heal
description: Out of battle, heals a Pokémon of a burn.

name: Ice Heal
description: Out of battle, defrosts a frozen Pokémon.

name: Awakening
description: Out of battle, awakens a sleeping Pokémon.

name: Full Heal
description: sFullHealDesc

name: Ether
description: Restores the PP of a selected move by 10.

name: Max Ether
description: Fully restores the PP of a selected move.

name: Elixir
description: Restores the PP of all moves by 10.

name: Max Elixir
description: Fully restores the PP of a Pokémon's moves.

name: Berry Juice
description: A 100% pure juice that restores HP by 20 points.

name: Sacred Ash
description: Fully revives and restores all fainted Pokémon.

name: Sweet Heart
description: A sweet chocolate that restores HP by 20 points.

name: Max Honey

name: HM01
description: Attacks the foe with sharp blades or claws.

name: HM02
description: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.

name: HM03
description: Creates a huge wave, then crashes it down on the foe.

name: HM04
description: Builds enormous power, then slams the foe.

name: HM05
description: Looses a powerful blast of light that reduces accuracy.

name: HM06
description: A rock-crushingly tough attack that may lower Defense.

name: HM07
description: Attacks the foe with enough power to climb waterfalls.

name: HM08
description: Dives underwater the 1st turn, then attacks next turn.

name: Oval Charm
description: Raises the chance of finding eggs at the daycare.

name: Shiny Charm
description: A charm that will raise the chance of Shiny Pokémon.

name: Catching Charm
description: A charm that raises the chance of Critical Captures.

name: Exp. Charm
description: A charm that raises the amount of Exp. earned in battle.

name: Rotom Catalog
description: A catalog full of devices liked by Rotom.

name: Gracidea
description: Bouquets made with it are offered as a token of gratitude.

name: Reveal Glass
description: This glass returns a Pokémon back to its original form.

name: DNA Splicers
description: Splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon.

name: Zygarde Cube
description: An item to store Zygarde Cores and Cells.

name: Prison Bottle
description: A bottle used to seal a certain Pokémon long ago.

name: N-Solarizer
description: A device to fuse and split Necrozma using a Solgaleo.

name: N-Lunarizer
description: A device to fuse and split Necrozma using a Lunala.

name: Reins of Unity
description: Reins that unite Calyrex with its beloved steed.

name: Mega Ring
description: Enables {PKMN} holding their Mega Stone to Mega Evolve.

name: Z-Power Ring
description: A strange ring that enables Z-Move usage.

name: Dynamax Band
description: A band carrying a Wishing Star that allows Dynamaxing.

name: Bicycle
description: A folding bicycle that is faster than the Running Shoes.

name: Mach Bike
description: A folding bicycle that doubles your speed or better.

name: Acro Bike
description: A folding bicycle capable of jumps and wheelies.

name: Old Rod
description: Use by any body of water to fish for wild Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
description: A decent fishing rod for catching wild Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
description: The best fishing rod for catching wild Pokémon.

name: Dowsing Machine
description: A device that signals an invisible item by sound.

name: Toku Map
description: Can be viewed anytime. Shows your present location.

name: Vs. Seeker
description: A rechargeable unit that flags battle- ready Trainers.

name: Berry Pouch

description: This device grants access to the {PKMN} Storage System.

name: Poké Flute

name: Fame Checker

name: Teachy TV
